entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: ESE 31 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this afternoon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain or drizzle this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
